titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: E. William Jensen (b. 1932) is the founder and CEO of Geos Corporation (originally called Geoscience Instruments Corporation), a manufacturer of grinding and lapping materials and instruments, which were primarily purchased by companies in the electronics and semiconductor industries. Geos merged with Rodel in 1984.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of Jensen's 45-page chronological history of Geos and his professional life, and supplementary documents. Materials include: sales brochures, business correspondence, magazine articles on polishing technology, and photographs.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

otherfindaid.p: An inventory is available in the repository.
